channel.title: BiCIKL on Plazi

item.title: Annotating genes sequences with data from herbarium sheets and publications
item.description: Figure 1: A snapshot of a published table showing the GenBank accession numbers and localities for the 507 individuals representing 61 species of Cladocera and 19 of Copepoda used in this study. DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.1839.1.1 Figure 2: The same table as in Figure 1 extracted by TreatmentBank. Full table available in HTML and JSON formats. Linking molecular data to taxonomic names and their extensive taxonomic treatments represents a fundamental component in biodiversity assessment.
